skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Focus on designing and improving user interfaces to enhance the overall user experience of digital products.

skills.title: Full-Stack
skills.description: I learn and apply coding skills to create and maintain web applications, working on both front-end and back-end development.

portfolio.title: Weather App
portfolio.description: This project is a weather application that allows users to search for current weather data for any city, providing information for the current day, the next five days, and an extended 30-day forecast.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Website
portfolio.description: An E-commerce application with 4 HTML pages that include JavaScript and CSS elements to implement the functionalities required using Ajax technique and map the response received from the server to JavaScript classes.

portfolio.title: Dark-Kitchen
portfolio.description: This is a dynamic single-page restaurant menu application. The application is designed for a Dark Kitchen online delivery service and includes a list of dishes that users can order online.

portfolio.title: Ash-Mademoiselle
portfolio.description: Ash-Mademoiselle is a user-friendly full-stack MERN application destined to help you explore and purchase handcrafted, custom-made leather clothing.

portfolio.title: Shopping List
portfolio.description: An HTML page that includes JavaScript and CSS elements to implement the functionalities required for a shopping list application.

portfolio.title: Book List
portfolio.description: A Book List app is created to manage and display a collection of books. Each book is represented as an object with properties like title, author, and ISBN code. You can add, remove, and display books dynamically in the user interface.
